item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades Chipotle, sees a stock rebound after a rough start to 2025
item.description: Analyst Brian Harbour upgraded the burrito chain to overweight and upped his price target on the stock to $70, which suggests 29.7% potential upside.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas names struggling Tesla a top pick, sees nearly 50% comeback
item.description: Analyst Adam Jonas has an overweight rating on the stock, and his $430 price target implies about 46.8% potential upside for Tesla shares.

item.title: ‘This is not a time to be making big bets.’ This market pro is following Warren Buffett’s lead.
